text: David Scondras (January 5, 1946 â€“ October 21, 2020) was an American politician. He was a member of the Boston City Council of District 8 seat from 1984 through 1993. He was one of a few members of the Democratic Socialists of America to be elected to public office.Democratic Left, vol. 8 no. 1 (January 1990), page 7. He was born in Lowell, Massachusetts. Scondras died on October 21, 2020 in Boston, Massachusetts at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Boston
title: David Scondras
